title: Between the Scenes - Trump Gets a Lawsuit and an FBI Report for His Birthday
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Trump Gets a Lawsuit and an FBI Report for His Birthday
description:
On his 72nd birthday, President Trump was slapped with a lawsuit by New York's attorney general and received news about possible bias against him within the FBI.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
